LOAD R0 0
ADD R0 R0 1
COMPARE R13 R0 5
BRANCH -2 IF LT
LOAD R1 2          # Load address 0 into R1
STORE R1 R0        # Store value in R0(5) in address in R1

00000110110100000000000000000000
00000011000000000000000000001000
00000011110001101000000000101000
01000111010000000000000000000010
00000110110100001000000000010000
00000101111000001000000000000000
